raw_snippet: The essay continues with references to Hitler's genius and his methods. I pray that the paradise of Chi-Town is not being corrupted Dog Pack DPM by the insane vision of a 20th Century madman. This world knows too Light Riot Armor much pain already. The Dog Pack force is a recent addition to the Coalition armed forces. The mutant dogs are used for reconnaissance and city law enforcement, specifically in the areas of tracking fugitives, supernatural monsters, Coalition "Dead Boy" magic, and psionics. The armor is light, allowing for maximum mobility and stealth. Unfortunately, it offers minimal physical protection. This Body Armor is due, in part, to the Coalition's perception that the intelligent mutant dogs are little more than trained animals and quite expendable. The famous Death's…
